clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in brain temporal lobe with SUVmax 6.65.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in brain temporal lobe, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
